manifest:
# https://ziplineeci.io/usage/manifest/#labels
labels:
  app: ziplinee-ci-api
  team: ziplinee-team
  language: golang

# https://ziplineeci.io/usage/manifest/#versioning
version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0

# https://ziplineeci.io/usage/manifest/#build-stages
stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.11.2-alpine3.8
    workDir: /go/src/${ZIPLINEE_GIT_SOURCE}/${ZIPLINEE_GIT_OWNER}/${ZIPLINEE_GIT_NAME}
    env:
      CGO_ENABLED: 0
      GOOS: linux
    commands:
    - go test `go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/`
    - go build -a -installsuffix cgo -o ./publish/${ZIPLINEE_LABEL_APP} .

  # https://ziplineeci.io/usage/extensions/ziplinee-extensions/#extensions-docker
  bake:
    image: extensions/docker:stable
    action: build
    repositories:
    - ziplinee
    path: ./publish
    copy:
    - /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: extensions/docker:stable
    action: push
    repositories:
    - ziplinee

  # https://ziplineeci.io/usage/extensions/ziplinee-extensions/#extensions-slack-build-status
  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:stable
    workspace: ziplinee
    channels:
    - '#build-${ZIPLINEE_LABEL_TEAM}'
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' ||
      status == 'failed'

# https://ziplineeci.io/usage/manifest/#releases
releases:
  development:
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:stable
        visibility: private
        container:
          port: 5000
          env:
            ENV1: value
          cpu:
            request: 100m
            limit: 100m
          memory:
            request: 256Mi
            limit: 256Mi
        hosts:
        - ci.development.ziplineeci.io

      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:stable
        workspace: ziplinee
        channels:
        - '#build-${ZIPLINEE_LABEL_TEAM}'
        when:
          status == 'succeeded' ||
          status == 'failed'

  staging:
    stages:
      # https://ziplineeci.io/usage/extensions/ziplinee-extensions/#extensions-gke
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:stable
        visibility: private
        container:
          port: 5000
          env:
            ENV1: value
          cpu:
            request: 100m
            limit: 100m
          memory:
            request: 256Mi
            limit: 256Mi
        hosts:
        - ci.staging.ziplineeci.io

      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:stable
        workspace: ziplinee
        channels:
        - '#build-${ZIPLINEE_LABEL_TEAM}'
        when:
          status == 'succeeded' ||
          status == 'failed'

  production:
    # https://ziplineeci.io/usage/manifest/#release-actions
    actions:
    - name: deploy-canary
    - name: deploy-stable
    - name: rollback-canary
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:stable
        visibility: private
        container:
          port: 5000
          env:
            ENV1: value
          cpu:
            request: 100m
            limit: 100m
          memory:
            request: 256Mi
            limit: 256Mi
        hosts:
        - ci.ziplineeci.io

      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:stable
        workspace: ziplinee
        channels:
        - '#build-${ZIPLINEE_LABEL_TEAM}'
        when:
          status == 'succeeded' ||
          status == 'failed'
